statements: UPDATE waste_management_feedback SET rating = 4 WHERE customer_id = 101 AND feedback_id = 1

UPDATE waste_management_services SET service_rating = 4.5, service_description = 'Premium waste collection service' WHERE service_id = 2;

UPDATE waste_management_services SET feedback = 'Excellent service!', service_rating = 5 WHERE customer_id = 123;
UPDATE customer_details SET customer_name = 'John Doe', customer_email = 'johndoe@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 456;
UPDATE CustomerFeedback SET feedback_text = 'Improved feedback text' WHERE feedback_id = 1;
UPDATE WasteManagementServices SET service_description = 'Enhanced service quality' WHERE service_type = 'Trash Collection';

UPDATE WasteManagementServices SET service_description='Enhanced waste disposal practices' WHERE service_id=201
